name: Mischief Office
description:
Top-down 3D stealth puzzle game where the goal is to piss off the boss as much as you can.

Game mechanics are mostly finished. Before releasing there is need for players feedback what can be changed in game. If you want to give me feedback about this game. I will be very grateful!
